page_title: OverleafCopilot - Scholar writing copilot for Overleaf
slogan: Seamlessly incorporate ChatGPT to power and accelerate academic writing in Overleaf.

buttons.tooltip: Compatible with Chrome, Edge, Opera, Arc and other Chromium-based Browsers

highlights.title: OpenAI Proxy: Effortless Access to GPT-3.5 and GPT-4
texts: Access OpenAI models directly without the need for an API key, offering straightforward and immediate use.

highlights.title: Featured Agents: Ongoing Evolution of Advanced Agents
texts: Upgrade your Copilot effortlessly by installing cutting-edge agents with just a click.

highlights.title: Completer: Crafting the Next Sentence for You
texts: Complete or extend your sentences with context-aware suggestions.

highlights.title: Rewriter: Enhance Your Content with a Single Click
texts: Easily refine your drafts into polished academic works.

highlights.title: Translator: The Superior Choice for Academic Papers
texts: Outperforms standard translation tools by preserving the academic tone and specific terminology effectively.

highlights.title: Checker: An Advanced Grammar and Spelling Tool
texts: Leverage AI for comprehensive detection and correction of writing errors, ensuring impeccable results.

highlights.title: Deep Integration with Overleaf
texts: Customize interface placement and size for an adaptable workflow.

highlights.title: Highly Customizable Interface
texts: Customize the interface theme to reflect your style and preference.

highlights.title: Customizable Models and Prompts
texts: Tailor ChatGPT models and prompts to meet your specific needs.

highlights.title: Enhanced Support for Rich Text Rendering
texts: Effortlessly switch between rich text and source code modes for optimal viewing.
